The original claim stated that House Dem: 3 trillion bailout bill to keep the House in recess until July 21.
The original author of the meme: TrendingPolitics.com, admitted that the claim was inaccurate and corrected their post after it was flagged by fact-checkers.
Fact: checkers participating in Facebook's fact-checking partnership flagged the claim as wrong and provided the correct information.
The correct information was verified by: HR 6800 - The Heroes Act, and resolution H.Res. 967 adopted by the House, which stated that the House could adjourn on any legislative day from May 19, 2020, through July 21, 2020.
